items.title:
Good mornin @everyone 

"Every audition you walk into isn’t just a chance to be …
items.summary:
Good mornin @everyone 

"Every audition you walk into isn’t just a chance to be chosen, it’s a chance to practise being unforgettable." 

— Casting Calls UK

Think about it, not every role will be yours, and that’s perfectly fine. What matters is how you show up. Each audition is rehearsal for the next, each self-tape a step toward mastery. If you leave a mark, whether through energy, professionalism, or presence, then you’ve already won. Casting directors remember the ones who light up the room, even if the role goes to someone else. Keep walking in with that spark.

Casting Calls UK Team 🎬🇬🇧

#castingcallsuk #actormotivation #auditiontips #selftapelife #actorsjourney #actingcareer #actorlife #onsetlife #castingdirectors #BeUnforgettable

items.title:
**Hello,**

**We are looking for actors for the shooting of a short movie we wil…
items.summary:
**Hello,**

**We are looking for actors for the shooting of a short movie we will be filming at Trebas.**

**Here is the information :**

**Production title**: A Killer on the Run

**Unionized / Non-unionized**: Non-unionized

**Production Type**: Student

**Project duration**: Short film (10 minutes)

**Production company: **Trebas Institute

**Director: **Daniel Langlois Houle

**Casting director: Jean-Philippe Lévesque**

**Location of the hearing: **550 Sherbrooke West

**Location of the filming **: Montreal

**Courriel** : dave198816@icloud.com

**Compensation **: Non

**Auditions **: 11-25-2024 / 11-26-2023

**Start of filming** : 15-01-2024

**End of filming: **16-01-2024

**Synopsis**

One Saturday morning, the charismatic and seductive Mathéo, graduating from the Shivers Film Institute, auditions to produce his script with Ben Sirois, a renowned producer. The meeting quickly takes a dramatic turn and becomes a matter of life and death for the two men. Who will survive the hearing? It's up to you to find out!

**Character descriptions**

MATHÉO: 30 YEARS OLD, GRADUATING AT THE SHIVERS CINEMA INSTITUTE. ATTRACTIVE AND VERY CHARMING, HE WANTS TO BECOME A DIRECTOR AND SCREENWRITER. THROUGH HIS MUSCULAR APPEARANCE AND THE IMPRESSION OF HAVING EVERYTHING GOING FOR HIM, HE IS READY TO MAKE THE NECESSARY EFFORTS TO MAKE HIS DREAMS COME TRUE.

BEN SIROIS: 40 YEARS OLD AND RENOWNED PRODUCER IN THE FILM INDUSTRY. IT IS VICIOUS AND INAPPROPRIATE. ONE LOOK AT HIM IS ENOUGH TO UNDERSTAND THAT HE IS FULL OF BAD INTENTIONS AND THAT HE IS READY TO DO ANYTHING TO ACHIEVE HIS ENDS.

GEORGE: 50 YEARS OLD AND JANITOR AT THE SHIVERS INSTITUTE. HE IS POLITE, SYMPHATIC AND HELPFUL. HE IS A MAN OF SIMPLE APPEARANCE AND WITHOUT HISTORY.

**Thanks in advance for the answer. We await it with enthusiasm.**

**Sincerely,**

**JP Lévesque**

items.title: Casting Call! Warrington/Manchester area, late October/early November filming da…
items.summary:
Casting Call! Warrington/Manchester area, late October/early November filming dates

We are looking for one Female and one Male actor to play the lead roles in our upcoming short film, ‘Oh, Death’, a comedy drama exploring themes of choice, family, death and morality. Synopsis below;

After his abrupt and unexpected death, Peter is almost elated to be greeted by an Agent of Death and to discover that there is an afterlife. Peter believes he’s done enough good to earn his ticket Up, but when sarcastic and bored Margo tells him he’s going Down, Peter has only a short time to convince her to change her mind to avoid an eternity of punishment.

The Roles-

Peter- 
Male
Age- 35-45

Personality- Selfish, uncaring, wants to be good but rarely musters up the effort to do so

Requirements for the role-Willing to learn a few Gaelic phrases

Margo- 
Female
Age- 30-40

Personality- Sarcastic, funny, rude, nonchalant yet an imposing figure

Requirements for the role- Willing to learn a few Gaelic phrases

Due to the limited budget of our film, roles are unpaid but we will cover the cost of travel and provide/pay for food and drink. Filming will take place in Warrington/Manchester area, filming dates are;

Saturday 25th October
Friday 7th November
Saturday 8th November

If you’re interested, we’d love to hear from you! 

Send an email to deadhorsestudios2025@gmail.com stating which character you’d like to play and a link to your showreel if you have one! Shortlisted actors will be given more character information and will be asked to record a self tape of one of the scenes before we make our final decision.

You can visit our YouTube or Instagram page, Dead Horse Studios, to check out a little of what we’re about, including our latest short film, ‘The Block’ that was entered into the Cannes Film Festival earlier this year.

We can’t wait to hear from you,
Andrew and the rest of the Dead Horse Studios crew.

items.title: Question for Americans who have acted in the UK:  I am being required to get Pub…
items.summary: Question for Americans who have acted in the UK:  I am being required to get Public Liability Insurance.  This seems to be an easy thing to get for UK citizens.  It comes with their version of Equity dues.  However, UK insurance companies won't cover me as I am not a citizen.  US companies either don't know what I'm talking about or offer me a policy that costs $2500/year to start with.  How have you handled PLI working in the UK?

items.title: Hallo liebe Filmfreunde, ich bin Gavin 19 Jahre alt und komme aus Stuttgart. Ein…
items.summary: Hallo liebe Filmfreunde, ich bin Gavin 19 Jahre alt und komme aus Stuttgart. Ein guter Freund von mir aus Hollywood konnte mich für Filmproduktion begeistern und daher möchte ich in diesem Gebiet nun selbst tätig werden. Ich habe jetzt mein erstes Filmset in Hamburg hinter mir und konnte schon einige Erfahrungen sammeln, wodurch ich nun um so mehr motiviert bin tiefer in die Filmwelt eintauchen. Falls ihr für  die nächsten 2 Wochen 15 bis 28.9 Unterstützung am Set braucht, oder ihr jemanden kennt der kurzfristig einen Assistenten benötigt schreibt mich gerne an. Ab 1 Oktober bin ich für 2 Wochen in Amerika, dannach stehe ich aber voll zur Verfügung. Ich freue mich über jede positive Nachricht. Gavin

items.title: Hello! Two casting calls! Auditions are either first come first serve or remote …
items.summary:
Hello! Two casting calls! Auditions are either first come first serve or remote depending on which role you want! 

**FIRST:**

**Title: **I have (transference)

**Genre**: Weird comedy

**Logline:** A woman's therapist thinks she's hitting on him but she insists that she's just been referencing stand-up comic Tom Papa this whole time. 

**Role:** Jeremy, 30s, male, any ethnicity. Therapist, Buddhist, loves hiking, gives people the benefit of the doubt. But this situation is just a little too doubtful. 

**Film date**: Unknown, but most likely a weekend in October. One day

**Location:** Unknown, but most likely in Aurora CO.

**Compensation:** None but free lunch & gas

***SECOND:***

**Title:** The Baseball Bat

**Genre: **Comedic Thriller

**Logline**: Jake has tools to manage his anxiety now. But he comes across his biggest hurdle yet: chaperoning a group of detention students who learn that faking a concussion can get them out of class early. Will this prove to be too much for him or will he finally resolve a worry on his own? 

**Roles:** Students, ages 7-14. All genders and ethnicities. You'll be extras but you'll be able to improvise your own lines!

**Shooting date**: Unknown, because we still have to find a school that'd be willing to let me film there, but hopefully some time in October or November, most likely soon after school gets let out on a weekday. Only one day. 

**Shooting location**: Also unknown, but definitely a school of some sort either in the Denver or Aurora area. 

Kindly email me at jakewunger@gmail.com or text at 571.276.4722 if interested! All extras welcome (no auditions necessary) and Jeremy applicants should get an email with a prompt for remote auditions within the next two weeks. Thanks!

items.title:
**– OPEN CASTING CALL BERLIN–**

We are looking for a male actor for a small but…
items.summary:
**– OPEN CASTING CALL BERLIN–**

We are looking for a male actor for a small but charming role in a unique, stylized commercial for a household product – the style: dry humour and minimal setting. Inspiration remains the 'intelligence' Spot from Apple: 🎬 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=deNzYrTvqCs

**When?** 1 Day, **05.05.2025**

**Where?** Location: Berlin

**Budget?** 500 € / 100% Buyout online

**Role Description**
* Man, 35–37 years old
* Curly hair, beard
* Sweet das/husband vibes – kind, a little scatterbrained
* Warm, lovable presence; silent but expressive

**Performance Style**

Our "Dad/ Husband" appears briefly but memorably. There is **no dialogue** – it's all about the moment, the look, the feeling. He enjoys a sandwich with theatrical pleasure. He looks at his partner with genuine warmth.

**Casting Video Instructions**

Please submit a self-tape with the following:
1. Sit or stand, pretend to take a **delightful bite of a sandwich** – big emotion in a small act.
2. A second short clip: look at your partner **lovingly**, just a glance that says it all – no words needed.
3. **3 Recent Photos**: Full body, profile, portrait

No lines. We’re looking for **presence**, **timing**, and a **touch of charm**.

Please upload your self-tape and photos to **WeTransfer** by **26.04.2025**. 📩 Send to: **casting@bearfilm.tv**

We can’t wait to meet you!

items.title:
VI MANGLER DIG TIL FANTASY QUEST! 

Er du til interaktivt teater? Så er det måsk…
items.summary:
VI MANGLER DIG TIL FANTASY QUEST! 

Er du til interaktivt teater? Så er det måske dig, vi står og mangler.

D.19., 20. og 21. september forvandler hele Esbjerg sig til en stor Fantasy Festival. I den forbindelse søger vi frivillige aktører, som vil være med i en helt fantastisk Fantasy Quest.

Vi søger folk i alle aldre til både store og mindre roller.

Fantasy Quest er et interaktivt teater, hvor gæsterne skal gå en rute, hvor de præsenteres for en historie og skal løse gåder. Arrangementet er lavet i samarbejde med Esbjerg Bibliotek.

HVORNÅR?

I Esbjerg centrum, d. 19., 20. og 21. september.

Der er både en børne-Quest i dagtimerne, og en mere skræmmende voksen- Quest til aften. Du må gerne være med til begge, men vi kan også bruge folk, som kun kan medvirke til et af arrangementerne.

Dagsarrangementerne er lørdag d. 20. sep. kl. 7.00 - 17.00 og søndag d. 21 kl. 7.00 - 14.00.

Aftenarrangementet er fredag d. 19. sep. og lørdag d. 20. sep., begge dage kl. 15.00-22.30.

HVAD FÅR DU?
* Partout armbånd til Fantasy Festival i Esbjerg
* Forplejning under din vagt
* Mulighed for overnatning

Ansøg her: https://forms.gle/pfc15udAwKdPBraf8

Trailer for dagsarrangementet kan ses her: [[https://fantasyfestival.dk/fantasy-quest-esbjerg](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffantasyfestival.dk%2Ffantasy-quest-esbjerg%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBEwUHB6YVp4VDRxTk9EOXU2VwEeNXOp4PDghSP2SpqxsbDL0CkccPszJfC1XCAzY7H2YVWhfxjjIhfvCl8p5vs_aem_WmUJevlgeddzpMh33wNqKw&h=AT30nwepdjRyfdSxCzf-7mObJlY9a-a7MVfwvJEBFwnTDKqeAueWZvjb73u9Ch_A1XYQB7ELiG9oPHxOn5bkiQssyz9WpTU830R0c0ZIQfQke9ICOEqffbIp33W6PdIGR7fb&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT1wDz3WVe_ilRdiFYpZeV8qu4cHMvTZGuc0-RiVD2zGQtqlrc5xea1ykhqYn2lC2PEM7VECENRCnyUatXLKbVpMWeez69HBfWJBcec1_lAfiXtD691HmY-V1TnAC-mH6MNDDyLd4Fby5KcCCFi-u_pyfO--UPAaUrmX_7IUx3EqTDtP7L0ZHA2F19Cm1AyfTELAK3M_HwdZjv_l2zw_psVsRh3WC93S)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffantasyfestival.dk%2Ffantasy-quest-esbjerg%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBEwUHB6YVp4VDRxTk9EOXU2VwEeBvuiMNvi7wiYWY8Z746DSs8uGnzl5ZPi-DnsvwoXdNW29IxPAgsJRA35gDk_aem_M1jhYmM2KZWk6OJvUqfDRw&h=AT30nwepdjRyfdSxCzf-7mObJlY9a-a7MVfwvJEBFwnTDKqeAueWZvjb73u9Ch_A1XYQB7ELiG9oPHxOn5bkiQssyz9WpTU830R0c0ZIQfQke9ICOEqffbIp33W6PdIGR7fb&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT1wDz3WVe_ilRdiFYpZeV8qu4cHMvTZGuc0-RiVD2zGQtqlrc5xea1ykhqYn2lC2PEM7VECENRCnyUatXLKbVpMWeez69HBfWJBcec1_lAfiXtD691HmY-V1TnAC-mH6MNDDyLd4Fby5KcCCFi-u_pyfO--UPAaUrmX_7IUx3EqTDtP7L0ZHA2F19Cm1AyfTELAK3M_HwdZjv_l2zw_psVsRh3WC93S)

items.title:
**CASTINGCALL!!!! (ULØNNET)**

Hej alle sammen. Vi er et ambitiøst hold unge fil…
items.summary:
**CASTINGCALL!!!! (ULØNNET)**

Hej alle sammen. Vi er et ambitiøst hold unge filmskabere fra Potemkin - Den Jyske Filmskoles Masterclass, der søger skuespillere til vores første projekt dette semester.

 

**RESUME**: En velklædt bankmand hjælper en blind mand over en bro, men bliver bestjålet i processen. Da han opsøger ham for at få sine ting tilbage, opdager han, at “den blinde” forsørger en fattig familie gennem småbedrag. Konfrontationen blotlægger kontrasten mellem de små forbrydelser, der holder en familie i live, og de store privilegier, som bankmanden selv dagligt opretholder – og tvinger ham til at overveje, hvem der i virkeligheden er blind.

Hovedrollen er fundet og vi søger nu disse roller

**“BLIND MAND”:**

En mand på omkring 35 år, fattig og arbejdsløs, kæmper for at forsørge sin kone og deres fire børn. I sin desperation ser han ingen anden udvej end at snyde folk for at skaffe mad på bordet. Han udgiver sig for at være blind – en løgn, der tærer på hans samvittighed. Inderst inde skammer han sig over bedraget, men af ren nød og afmagt føler han sig tvunget til at fortsætte, fordi han vil gøre alt for sin familie.

**ASSISTENT:**

En kvinde på omkring 25 år, der uden tøven gør, hvad der bliver sagt. Hun elsker både sit arbejde og følelsen af magt, og hendes trivsel afhænger af, at hendes chef er tilfreds. En glad chef giver hende ikke bare glæde, men også mulige bonusser og fordele.

**ET PAR (MAND & DAME):**

Ungt ægtepar, der bliver afvist et lån i Banken.

Mand - 25-40

Kvinde - 25-40

**BARISTA: **

18-25, køn underordnet - ung energisk barista

**GADETIGGER:**

Stereotypisk gadetigger udseende og adfærd søges til denne rolle.

**Praktisk**: 

Optagelserne foregår i og omkring Aarhus C. mellem den 8.-10. september. 

Casting kommer til at foregå mandag/tirsdag 1./2. september. på Potemkin - Den Jyske Filmskole, Fredens Torv 3A, Aarhus C - Respektive specifikke tidspunkter aftales over mail.

Er du interresseret i en af rollerne, kan du tage fat i mig på Mail. Vedhæft hvilken rolle/roller du søger, alder og eventuelt showreel/portfolio. 

[BastianKapela@gmail.com](mailto:BastianKapela@gmail.com)

Vi glæder os til at høre fra jer, hilsen team **BLIND BANK**

**Freya Carlsen**, Instruktør & Manus

**Lukas Steenbjerg**, Fotograf & Klipper

**Bastian Kapela**, Producer

items.title:
**OPEN AUDITIONS**

**We are based in Myrtle Beach but travel**

**For appointme…
items.summary:
**OPEN AUDITIONS**

**We are based in Myrtle Beach but travel**

**For appointment and sides email Head Shot & Resume to**

**Anthony.kateridge@yahoo.com**

 

           We are looking for 2 cast members to work on our traveling team of actors for our lighthearted murder mystery centered around a wacky Mob family. YOU MUST HAVE GOOD IMPROV CHOPS show is totally interactive with the audience from the second they walk into the venue. Show is very flexible lots of room for improv script is more of a guideline as long as storyline stays constant. The killer, victim and the reason for the murder WILL change nightly. Actors must OWN their characters and make the part their own at the same time be able to leave their egos at the door. We are all equals in this cast Eventually all actors should be able to switch roles with each other making for fun and different scenarios.

** **

**Tina / Tommy (30 + Male or Female):** Wanna be singer the boss is trying to push. Boss has record company people there to see performance even though he has never heard *him or her sing* Only knows son -in- law says singer constantly sings at Pizzeria. Prefer someone that cannot sing a note although if you can sing, we can work that into the show. Day job is pizza maker in the Pizza Business run by Boss' son-in-law. Female singer acts like they are the best since Cher / Celine Dion and Male acts like he is Tom Jones/Elvis & Mick Jager all rolled into one

 

 

**ANGIE CANNOLLI***** (*****Female 30+)**

She is Food and Beverage Manger at this event.  She works for her Dads Legit business and only hired her husband to be here tonight, as the group was so huge. She has a vague clue about life and Only half understands Dad’s Business. She just knows everyone is afraid of him. She’s not happy husband & dad are there at same time here. Knows her father hates him.

items.summary:
Hej alle derude
Jeg har drømt  om at blive skuespiller siden folkeskolen. 

Om mig
Mit navn er Victoria, jeg er 28 år og bor i Holbæk. Skuespil har altid været min store passion. Jeg har erfaring fra reklamer, fotoshoots, teater, musikvideoer og film.

Min første julekalender var Tidrejsen, hvor jeg blev castet, og siden da har jeg været med i forskellige projekter. Jeg har også spillet teater helt tilbage fra folkeskolen og elsker stadig at stå foran kameraet og udfordre mig selv med nye roller.

Jeg er åben for nye muligheder – både film, tv, reklamer og andre produktioner. Jeg er positiv, engageret og brænder for at give liv til de karakterer, jeg spiller.

items.summary:
‼️OOOOHHH 🤩🤯 schnell mit "❤️" kommentieren, um dabei zu sein!!

 

Wir veranstalten am 04.05 einen kostenlosen Workshop für alle Darsteller. 

 

Ich teile darin wichtige Learnings aus 10 Jahren, seit der Gründung von Castfinder All-in-One Casting. 

 

„Dein perfekter Bewerbungsauftritt als Darsteller oder Schauspieler 

... Fotos und Videos, die Caster begeistern“

 

Ich bin so aufgeregt!

 

Es wird dort auch ein einmaliges, neues, internationales Projekt vorgestellt. 

 

Du kannst dich auch eintragen, falls du beim Termin keine Zeit hast, um die Aufzeichnung zu erhalten, aber LIVE lohnt sich garantiert wesentlich mehr.

 

Achtung: Die Aufzeichnung wird nur wenige Tage lang online sein. 

 

Ich freue mich riesig darauf dich dort zu sehen. 

Liebe Grüße

Sarah

items.title:
**Project Type**: Feature Film
**Casting Locations**: New York City, NY; Miami, …
items.summary:
**Project Type**: Feature Film
**Casting Locations**: New York City, NY; Miami, FL, London
**Roles**:
* **Pandora**: Day Player, Female, 25–30
* **Newscaster**: Lead, Female, 30–45
* **Radicaux Member**: Day Player, Female, 25–30

**IMDB: **[https://www.imdb.com/title/tt16121314/](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt16121314/)

**Production:** Manhattan Project Films
1. **Pandora** (Day Player, Female, 25–30)

**Role Description**:
Pandora is a mysterious and enigmatic figure who appears at a pivotal moment in the film. She is not bound by conventional morality and operates in the gray areas of the law. Her motivations are unclear, and she serves as both an ally and a potential threat to the protagonist.

**Character Traits**:
* **Appearance**: Striking and memorable, with an unconventional beauty that draws attention.
* **Personality**: Charismatic and manipulative, with a calm demeanor that hides a calculating mind.
* **Skills**: Highly intelligent, resourceful, and adept at reading people.
* **Backstory**: Little is known about her past, adding to her mystique.

**Character Arc**:
Pandora's role is to challenge the protagonist's perceptions and decisions, pushing them to confront their own moral compass. Her true intentions remain ambiguous throughout the film, keeping both the protagonist and the audience on edge

2. **Newscaster** (Lead, Female, 30–45)

**Role Description**:
The Newscaster is the voice of authority and information in the film. She anchors the narrative's exposition, delivering crucial updates and insights that drive the plot forward. Her reports are often the first indication of escalating events in the city.

**Character Traits**:
* **Appearance**: Professional and polished, with a commanding presence.
* **Personality**: Composed, articulate, and empathetic, with a strong sense of duty.
* **Skills**: Exceptional communication abilities, quick thinking, and a deep understanding of the city's dynamics.
* **Backstory**: A seasoned journalist with years of experience in the field, she has witnessed the city's transformation over time.

**Character Arc**:
The Newscaster's role is to provide context and clarity amidst the chaos. As the story unfolds, her reports become more urgent and personal, reflecting the growing tension and her own emotional investment in the events.

3. **Radicaux Member** (Day Player, Female, 25–30)

**Role Description**:
The Radicaux Member is a passionate and dedicated activist involved in underground movements. She is a catalyst for change, challenging the status quo and advocating for the marginalized. Her actions are driven by a deep-seated belief in justice and equality.

**Character Traits**:
* **Appearance**: Edgy and distinctive, with a style that reflects her rebellious nature.
* **Personality**: Determined, fearless, and persuasive, with a strong moral compass.
* **Skills**: Organizational prowess, public speaking, and strategic planning.
* **Backstory**: Raised in a community that valued activism, she has been involved in various causes from a young age.

**Character Arc**:
The Radicaux Member's journey is one of sacrifice and resilience. She faces numerous challenges and setbacks but remains steadfast in her mission. Her actions inspire others and serve as a reminder of the power of collective action.

items.title:
Hej kære kollegaer!

Jeg er egentlig uddannet skuespiller, men har siden hen ogs…
items.summary:
Hej kære kollegaer!

Jeg er egentlig uddannet skuespiller, men har siden hen også uddannet mig som portrætfotograf og arbejder idag med begge ting, hvilket betyder at jeg er rigtig god til håndbogsbilleder 😉

Den 28. og 29. afholder jeg et event, som jeg kalder Portræt-Marathon. 🏃‍♂️

Kort fortalt går det ud på, at man kan købe en kort fotosession på 30 minutter for kun 800 kr (+ moms)!
For det får man 2 færdigredigerede portrætter. Ekstra portrætter kan tilkøbes for 200 kr pr. stk.

Sidste gang jeg afholdt dette event, blev tiderne revet væk, så skynd dig ind og book din tid!
Det hele foregår i et studie lige ved Nørreport.

Du kan læse mere om eventet og mig på min hjemmeside: www.a-sager.com

Jeg håber virkelig, du vil være med 😊

Kh,
Anton

items.title:
**🎬 Wir suchen dich – in Berlin, München, Frankfurt & Köln!**

Du bist über 40 …
items.summary:
**🎬 Wir suchen dich – in Berlin, München, Frankfurt & Köln!**

Du bist über 40 (M/W), sprichst klar und sicher vor der Kamera und hast vielleicht sogar schon mal mit einem Teleprompter gearbeitet?

**Bis zu 1000€ pro Drehtag je nach Rolle.**

Für unsere nächsten Videoprojekte suchen wir Männer und Frauen ab 40 Jahren in Berlin, München, Frankfurt und Köln, die Lust haben, kurze, professionelle Videos aufzunehmen – mit einem Skript, das wir dir zur Verfügung stellen. Schauspiel-Erfahrung ist super, aber kein Muss. Wichtig ist uns eine deutliche Sprechweise und ein gepflegtes Auftreten vor der Kamera.

Ein eigener Teleprompter zu Hause ist ein großer Pluspunkt, da wir auch mit wiederkehrenden Produktionen (z. B. UGC-Videos) planen, die du später selbstständig aufnehmen kannst.

👉 So kannst du dich bewerben:

Schick uns einfach ein aktuelles Foto oder einen Link zu deinem Social-Media-Profil an **casting@friespictures.com**

Falls du bereits ein Video hast, in dem du ein Skript vorliest – gerne mitschicken! Wenn du für uns in Frage kommst, erhältst du ein kurzes Beispielskript für eine Probeaufnahme.

Wir freuen uns auf deine Nachricht! ✨

items.title:
**📢 STATIST SØGES TIL PITCHVIDEO 🎬**

Vi er en gruppe studerende fra Den Dansk…
items.summary:
**📢 STATIST SØGES TIL PITCHVIDEO 🎬**

Vi er en gruppe studerende fra Den Danske Reklameskole, der laver en pitchvideo til **Osteoporoseforeningen** – og vi har brug for **dig!**

🎭 **Hvem søger vi?**
En person i **40'erne** til at spille vores **irriterende hovedrolle** i en kort reklamevideo.

📍 **Hvor og hvornår?**
Optagelserne finder sted **søndag** ved **Rema1000 på Nørrebro**.

🎬 **Hvad handler videoen om?**
Vores indsigt:
👉 **Det er sejt at brække knogler som 8-årig, men ikke som 48-årig.**

I første omgang er det en **pitchvideo**, men hvis projektet bliver valgt, får du måske chancen for at medvirke i den endelige reklamefilm, som vil køre **2 uger i landets biografer** – og måske flere steder!

💰 Det er en frivillig rolle i pitchfasen, men vi lover en fed oplevelse og sjove optagelser.

🎥 **Vil du være med?**
Smid en besked eller skriv i kommentarfeltet, hvis du er interesseret! 🙌

items.title:
CASTING CALL

SITE SPECIFIC THEATRE 

Experienced and serious actor with strong …
items.summary:
CASTING CALL

SITE SPECIFIC THEATRE 

Experienced and serious actor with strong focus, intuition and comic timing needed for a single person site specific English language play, that takes place in a car with only four audience members (who are also in the car). Age and gender is not specified. Must be available for performances in late-May or April with a month of rehearsal before. Pay is from ticket sales profit share, with majority to the performer. Performance will be presented under the umbrella of a Berlin performance venue.

Short pitch: Four people are invited to view a car for sale, what unfolds is a touching and strange monologue from the seller about modern alienation, the death of ennui and the managed decline of our futures. With their headspace stuck somewhere between an endlessly distracted doom scroll and a deep and meaningful, the seller tries to attempt to truly connect with the possible buyers. All whilst being unsure if they can actually let go of the sacred decaying automobile.

For archive and promotion much of the dress rehearsal will be filmed with cinema cameras and produced to a high standard not normally available to underground theatre. Whilst the number of audience members will be very limited this video and promotional material will be of a very high standard. 

About me: I'm a Melbourne born, Berlin/London based film director diving back into theatre after a long hiatus. A creative space I'm looking forward to diving into in site specific experimental pieces over the coming year. I’m on the hunt for performers in Berlin hungry to do thought provoking, fresh and intense work. The world is on fire. Let’s make things that we can be proud of, before we’re all burnt. You can see a large portfolio of my film work here: [**https://vimeo.com/timkelly**]

Before April 10, please email relevant portfolio materials to: [timothygeorgekelly@gmail.com] with subject: “Carpark Casting”

items.title:
# CASTING CALL: JOIN OUR ACTING PODCAST

When a group of actors sit around a tab…
items.summary:
# CASTING CALL: JOIN OUR ACTING PODCAST

When a group of actors sit around a table and use their spoken words to portray characters all going on an adventure together, that's called a tabletop roleplaying game (TTRPG). Our gaming group plays a variety of tabletop roleplaying games and publishes the audio as a podcast. Example famous ttrpg podcasts: Critical Role, The Adventure Zone, etc. We react as our character to the scenario presented by the game master. We respond to challenges, overcome obstacles, make jokes and laugh with our fellow acting friends. Would you enjoy acting in-character for a podcast audience? Join us.

# When we play:

Weekends. Both European and American time zones. Joining us doesn't commit you to every weekend. Instead, we pick games we want to try and sign up for those calendar spots.

# How long we play / what it’s like:

Our members sit at their microphones for four hours talking their way through an adventure using their words and laughter to entertain each other. We use theater of the mind, saying out loud how far away targets are instead of looking at combat maps on a screen. The recordings are high quality, and we air the audio as a podcast. Don’t worry, we don’t publish our names or faces.

# System played:

We get to learn and play a different tabletop roleplaying game (ttrpg) system each session. There’s no financial burden to you. The systems are either free to everyone or we were sent a free promotional copy from its creator.

# Oneshot or campaign:

Both. Like a traditional campaign, we repeatedly meet familiar non player characters (NPCs), facing challenges and experiencing long term character growth. We play our same character for a year. Our characters start at low power in January, grow to epic max fighting strength by December, then retire. Like a oneshot, each individual episode opens with a beginning to its plot, and the exploration of its story ends after four hours.

# Game Mastering (GMing):

We rotate so that everyone is invited to be a player and a game master if they want. The GM gets to pick which ttrpg we play that weekend. If you find a fun ttrpg you want to try, you can sign up as the GM and be confident that there will be players excited to play with you. If you prefer to be a player every time that’s cool, too. Our members don't have to GM ever if they want a break from it. Getting to pick how often you GM really helps relieve burnout. GM as often as makes you happy.

# You can vibe check past games:

We're on itunes, spotify, youtube, and all the podcast apps. Our cast rotates. Skip around and listen to snippets from a few episodes to see which of our members you want to play with first. The episodes aren't all great, but we have fun together. This isn't a job. It's a hobby, a way to relax and laugh meeting new people who slowly over time become lifelong friends. It's okay to miss games; you aren’t expected to be present for every session. The opt-in format naturally minimizes table trouble because you can see who’s signed up to GM and play in a game before you join it, and can pick dates that have people you’re looking forward to playing with.

# Joining:

To join, email us at FirebreathingKittensPodcast at gmail dot com and tell us about your equipment. Our minimum requirement is 24 bit audio (not 16 bit). If you don’t know what 24 bit audio means that’s not a problem, the new members tab of FirebreathingKittensPodcast dot com has an equipment section that explains what all the microphone words mean with pictures and videos. We welcome members of all experience levels and will train you. The new members tab also has info about our format and answers to frequently asked questions. Minimum age 21 years old. We reply to all emails from people who have 24 bit audio within three days with a support agreement for you to sign, and then will guide you through character creation and train you how to record great audio.

items.title:
Jeg har altid drømt om at blive skuespiller så det her er min søgning

Jeg hedde…
items.summary:
Jeg har altid drømt om at blive skuespiller så det her er min søgning

Jeg hedder Julie og er 16 år gammel (17 her den 25 september)

Skuespil har altid interesseret mig siden jeg var helt helt lille. 

Jeg synger også så det er heller ikke noget problem. 

Jeg er i min fritid rytter og har hest stående i Dragør så hvis en film eller serie evt handler om heste er det heller ikke et problem. 

Mit store ønske er endag at kunne være medvirkende til en amerikansk film/serie. 

Jeg kan flydende engelsk og snakker engelsk til dagligt

Jeg har før hen danset en smule men det er ikke min største interesse 

Jeg har gået meget til cheerleading så det har jeg gjordt en del af. 

I mine folkeskole år har jeg spillet en del skuespil og er bare mega vild med det!

Jeg bor på Amager/2770

Er der nogle der søger en skuespiller? 

Her er lige et billede af mig, ved ikk om det er noget som skal bruges🙈

SKUESPILLERE SØGES, 8260
Stavtrupscenen er et amatørteater med eget teater og som er målrettet mod at være et teamteater, hvor alle aktive medlemmer har indflydelse på teaterets beslutninger og virke. 

Stavtrupscenen arbejder dramatisk ud fra høje krav om kvalitet på alle niveauer – såvel valg af repertoire, skuespiller kvalitet, scenografi, kostumer, etc.

Det er ikke lønnet - men det vil være muligt at søge om at blive medlem af foreningen efterfølgende,  når du har mødt det fantastiske hold 😁

Forestillingen har prøver i september – november (normalt mandag- og onsdag aftner kl. 19 – 22.) med efterfølgende forestillingsrække i november – starten af december.

We are looking for enthusiastic, reliable people who just l…
items.summary:
****Casting Call****
We are looking for enthusiastic, reliable people who just love Christmas and want to help to create some magical memories for our visiting families.

You must be able to improvise and remain in your character at all times. Full training will be given.

Our standards are very high and our reputation is very well known locally for providing a magical family Christmas Experience that is affordable to all. We are a happy, professional team and you will be provided with excellent working conditions. Many of our seasonal staff have been with us for many years, which speaks volumes.

Must be local to CM36HB, Essex and have transport to get to and from the venue (as public transport is not reliable in our area).

We run from mid November to, and including the 23rd December. You do not have to commit to every opening day but you will need to work at least 16 sessions (long days are classed as 2 sessions).

Open to everyone over the age of 16

We are open weekends and once we get to December also after school.

We are looking for:
Santa - natural beard preferred but we do provide top quality, human hair beards. Must have a wholesome attitude to Christmas
Mother Christmas - someone who will make the children feel at ease but who can control a section of elves
Elves - we have elves of all ages, we just need enthusiasm and a fun loving attitude
Train Driver for The Santa Express

If you think you would be perfect, please email info@thepartykingdom.co.uk telling us why you would be perfect, which character you would like to play and include a headshot

Renumeration will vary depending on the character and previous experience and will be confirmed once we have received your email.
We cannot wait to hear form you xxx

items.title:
Good morning to all,
We are The Easy English Theatre and we are looking for acto…
items.summary:
Good morning to all,
We are The Easy English Theatre and we are looking for actors and actresses.

Who are we?
The Easy English Theatre ([https://www.divadloanglicky.cz/](https://www.divadloanglicky.cz/)) is a unique project that brings language education to Czech students in a fun and engaging way.

We will be doing a 2-week tour from 3rd to 14th November 2025. The tour will take place in multiple Czech cities, and performances will be held in theatres and cultural centres with capacities of 300–500 people. The schedule runs Monday to Friday, mornings until lunchtime only.

We are looking for one young woman and one young man with an acting age of 18–25. We are specifically looking for native British English speakers who enjoy working with children and teenagers and would like to discover some beautiful parts of the Czech Republic.

We will cover all expenses (accommodation, food, travel) and offer a fee of £600 per week.

If you're interested, please send us a short video showcasing yourself as an actor to divadloanglicky@gmail.com.
We’re looking forward to meeting you!

items.title:
Hey peeps in Kansas or peeps who know peeps in Kansas!!
I'm doing a casting that…
items.summary:
Hey peeps in Kansas or peeps who know peeps in Kansas!!
I'm doing a casting that is specificaly looking for real Kansans. Is that how you say it? I should know, I married a green eye'd Kansas boy... but anyway, back to the point. I'm looking for a bunch of people and they can be from anywhere in the state. The filming team will come to you or at least pretty darn close to you.
The pay is $500 per person - even if your whole family books it
Usage: OOH, CTV, Social, Web, Print, Banners, Industrial, in perpetuity
It'd be awesome if you were actual BCBS customers, but you don't have to be! And you don't need to have any on camera experience.
If you fit the bill, please send an email with a photo of you and a little blurb about you and why you fit the project. Send it to shauna@sebcasting.com by end of day Friday Aug 29th.
Here are some specific people we're looking for, but we are also loking for just your regular Kansas folks too.
1) Farmer - We’re looking for a real farmer, any age, who works the land while managing a visible health challenge. This could be a prosthetic arm, an insulin pump, a hearing aid, or anything that shows their body has been through something and they are still out there doing the work and living their life.
This is not about overcoming a set-back in a glossy, commercial way. It is about the everyday toughness of someone who gets up before sunrise, feeds the animals, fixes the tractor, and keeps going. Dirt under the nails, sun on the face, humor in the voice. Someone who looks like they actually know what calluses feel like.
All races and genders are welcome. We want authenticity over polish. People not pretending to be farmers but real ones.
2) A student athlete - A real-deal young athlete, age 15–20, who’s currently in the thick of rehabbing a noticeable injury. This could be an ACL, ankle, shoulder. Something that leaves a brace, crutches, or scar, something that we as the viewer can see and feel in a split second.
We’re not shooting for shiny highlight reels or staged comebacks. We want the raw in-between. A kid still rocking the team hoodie at physical therapy. The one who hears the squeak of the gym floor but has to watch from the sideline. Someone with grit, humor, and honesty in how they carry themselves.
All races and backgrounds are welcome. We’re especially interested in faces and stories that look like real life, not polished models, or someone who is playing a role, but the real people. They should have a look of determination on their face. This isn’t a set-back but a stage for what comes next.
3) A graveyard shift worker - This isn’t about polished smiles or hero shots. It’s the tired eyes at 3 a.m., the coﬀee that barely keeps you upright, the quiet moments in fluorescent light when the world feels stuck in pause. Someone who looks like they know what it feels like to walk out of work and see the sun rise before they’ve even gone to bed.
All races, genders, and ages are welcome. We want someone real, not staged. A person who carries the weight of the night shift in the way they stand, move, and speak.
Prefer BCBS members
4) A 4H kid - We’re not after a glossy champion. We want the kid who smells like hay by noon, whose boots are dusty, and whose face says they’ve been up since sunrise. Someone who knows long rides in a pickup, the heat that sticks to your skin, and the noise of the barns drowning out the noise of the competition.
All races and backgrounds welcome. We want real Kansas kids who treat the fairgrounds like a second home, kids who know the dust, the heat, and the rhythm of competition better than the tourists ever will.
5) Hunters & Fishers - We are looking for real Kansans. Not models, not overly polished actors, but people who tell the true story of this state. People who represent Kansas in the way they stand, the way they work, the way they are. Our audience should be able to look at them and
think: that could be me, that could be my neighbor, that could be my family.
We are not looking for perfection. We are looking for authenticity. Lives that have been well-lived. Hands that show they have worked. Eyes that carry both resilience and pride.
People that without a single word,but a single look, can tell you where they are from and what they stand for, in an instant.
This cast should feel like Kansas itself, wide, varied, and diverse. From big cities, small towns, and open plains. Every age, every background, and every walk of life. People whose presence says something true before they even have to talk.
6) Fossil diggers/Rock hounds - We are not looking for perfection. We are looking for authenticity. Lives that have been well-lived. Hands that show they have worked. Eyes that carry both resilience and pride.
People that without a single word,but a single look, can tell you where they are from and what they stand for, in an instant.
This cast should feel like Kansas itself, wide, varied, and diverse. From big cities, small towns, and open plains. Every age, every background, and every walk of life. People whose presence says something true before they even have to talk.
7) College students - Young people who tell the story of campus life in Kansas. We are looking for real Kansans. Not models, not overly polished actors, but people who
tell the true story of this state. People who represent Kansas in the way they stand, the
way they work, the way they are. Our audience should be able to look at them and think: that could be me, that could be my neighbor, that could be my family. We are not looking for perfection. We are looking for authenticity. This cast should feel like Kansas itself, wide, varied, and diverse. From big cities, small
towns, and open plains. Every age, every background, and every walk of life. People whose presence says something true before they even have to talk.

items.title: Calling all Denver film students! Are you ready to get some serious hands-on exp…
items.summary:
Calling all Denver film students! Are you ready to get some serious hands-on experience and build your portfolio with a project that's anything but ordinary? We're seeking talented and enthusiastic crew members for our short film, "And Then Jeff Killed Everyone" a dark comedy horror that twists the tropes of found footage and paranormal investigation shows.

This is an unpaid opportunity, but it's an incredible chance to contribute to a unique vision and gain valuable on-set experience that will help boost your reel and resume.

We're specifically looking for:

**Editor** **(Familiar with Found Footage & Paranormal Show Tropes)**

We need an editor who lives and breathes the aesthetics of found footage and paranormal investigation TV shows. Think jump cuts, shaky cam, sudden audio spikes, and the slow, creeping dread of a ghost hunt gone wrong. Your keen eye for pacing and your ability to craft tension and unexpected comedic beats will be essential. This is a chance to show off your understanding of genre conventions and subvert them!

**Makeup Artists** **(Specializing in Gore Effects)**

We're on the hunt for makeup artists with a flair for gore effects. Our script features some truly memorable (and messy) moments, and we need your skills to make them look horrifyingly real. This is your chance to showcase your practical effects abilities and create striking visuals for your portfolio.

If you're passionate about filmmaking and eager to gain practical experience on a project that defies expectations, we want to hear from you!

**Submit your reel/portfolio and resume to chrismusick23@gmail.com**

items.summary:
Hey Denver actors & acting students! Are you looking for an incredible opportunity to build your reel, gain valuable set experience, and bring a unique character to life on screen? We're casting for ***"And Then Jeff Killed Everyone,"*** a dark comedy horror pilot that playfully twists the paranormal investigation genre.

This is an unpaid student film, but it's a chance to work on a distinctive script, get high-quality footage for your reel, and connect with a passionate local film crew. We're looking for dedicated actors to fill these roles:

**Available Roles:**
* **Don Logins: **(Male, 20s-30s) Think Zak Bagans and Ed Hardy t-shirts. He's intense, self-indulgent, with gelled hair and an over-the-top style. Don is convinced of his own coolness and obsessed with proving ghosts are real, mostly for the fame. A fantastic opportunity for an actor who can lean into an exaggerated, yet committed, performance.
* **Nicole:** (Female, 20s-30s) Our kind, soft-spoken, and friendly Team Case Researcher. She's genuinely passionate about finding evidence of life after death and grounds the team with her sincerity. This role needs an actor who can convey warmth and a quiet determination.
* **Casey:** (Male, 20s-30s) Very intelligent and level-headed, with a dry wit. He approaches the paranormal with a healthy dose of skepticism but genuinely wants to see a ghost. We're looking for an actor who can deliver intelligent humor and a grounded presence.
* **Frankie:** (Male, 20s-30s) From Boston with a heavy accent, Frankie's a bit squirrelly and prone to screwing up. He's more of a film student than a paranormal investigator, initially a skeptic, and often finds himself in over his head. Great for an actor who excels at physical comedy and portrays nervous energy.
* **Stefania:** (Female, 20s-40s) A very no-nonsense medium with a Natasha Lyonne-type vibe. She's mostly nice to others but can be blunt. She claims to be a medium but is well aware that many think it's BS (and thinks those people can screw themselves). This role is perfect for an actor who can balance a strong, confident personality with comedic timing and a subtle layer of deception.

**If you're ready to dive into a fun and memorable project, please submit your headshot and resume to Chrismusick23@gmail.com. We can't wait to see your auditions!**

items.title:
This is me (and Zoe), ten years into a journey that almost never started.

At 47…
items.summary:
This is me (and Zoe), ten years into a journey that almost never started.

At 47, after a 16-year break, I tried to relaunch my acting career in Germany with no reel, no contacts, and very rusty skills. I had no idea how to explain the gap on my resume, and the thought of walking into a casting room again terrified me.

But giving up was not an option.

The solution hit me when I realized the problem itself was pointing the way forward. I needed training in English at a high level, and it did not exist in Munich. Flying to London, LA, or New York was unrealistic.

So I organized the workshops myself.

What happened next changed everything.

Instead of stumbling around in the dark trying to figure it out again, I could hit the ground running. Whenever I needed something like showreel material, headshots, the right kind of training, I organized it and got what I needed. If I had tried to piece it all together on my own, it would have taken ten times as long, and I did not have that kind of time.

That approach became my foundation. It is what eventually opened doors to work with studios like A24, Netflix, and Hallmark.

Along the way, I got world-class training for free as the organizer. A community of actors formed around those workshops. And unexpectedly, it also turned into steady income.

Here is the breakthrough: I always believed you had to "make it" before you could make money as a creative. What I discovered is that the journey itself can pay for itself.

Use what you need, whether that is training, practice, connections, or visibility, and shape it into something that lets other people get what they need too. That way you move your craft forward, build real relationships, get seen, and the process funds itself.

At first, I thought this only worked for actors because that is where I started. But the more I shared my story, the more I heard the same frustrations from other creatives: photographers, writers, artisans, even people into things like fermentation or traditional crafts. That's when it clicked. This approach is not just about acting. It can work anywhere someone is willing to use what they need to build what they want.

Ten years later, I am still living this way. I am constantly building skills, deepening connections, getting more visible in my craft, and funding it all as I go.

I am sharing this because I know too many people who keep their passions in the "someday" box. They wait until they feel "ready" or "expert enough" before letting themselves imagine it could actually support them.

But what if the very thing you think is holding you back is actually your starting point to a creative life that fits?

👉 For me, it was not having reel material or training. What’s been that thing for you?

items.title:
# CASTING CALL: JOIN OUR ACTING PODCAST

When a group of actors sit around a tab…
items.summary:
# CASTING CALL: JOIN OUR ACTING PODCAST

When a group of actors sit around a table and use their spoken words to portray characters all going on an adventure together, that's called a tabletop roleplaying game (TTRPG). Our gaming group plays a variety of tabletop roleplaying games and publishes the audio as a podcast. Example famous ttrpg podcasts: Critical Role, The Adventure Zone, etc. We react as our character to the scenario presented by the game master. We respond to challenges, overcome obstacles, make jokes and laugh with our fellow acting friends. Would you enjoy acting in-character for a podcast audience? Join us.

# When we play:

Weekends. Both European and American time zones. Joining us doesn't commit you to every weekend. Instead, we pick games we want to try and sign up for those calendar spots.

# How long we play / what it’s like:

Our members sit at their microphones for four hours talking their way through an adventure using their words and laughter to entertain each other. We use theater of the mind, saying out loud how far away targets are instead of looking at combat maps on a screen. The recordings are high quality, and we air the audio as a podcast. Don’t worry, we don’t publish our names or faces.

# System played:

We get to learn and play a different tabletop roleplaying game (ttrpg) system each session. There’s no financial burden to you. The systems are either free to everyone or we were sent a free promotional copy from its creator.

# Oneshot or campaign:

Both. Like a traditional campaign, we repeatedly meet familiar non player characters (NPCs), facing challenges and experiencing long term character growth. We play our same character for a year. Our characters start at low power in January, grow to epic max fighting strength by December, then retire. Like a oneshot, each individual episode opens with a beginning to its plot, and the exploration of its story ends after four hours.

# Game Mastering (GMing):

We rotate so that everyone is invited to be a player and a game master if they want. The GM gets to pick which ttrpg we play that weekend. If you find a fun ttrpg you want to try, you can sign up as the GM and be confident that there will be players excited to play with you. If you prefer to be a player every time that’s cool, too. Our members don't have to GM ever if they want a break from it. Getting to pick how often you GM really helps relieve burnout. GM as often as makes you happy.

# You can vibe check past games:

We're on itunes, spotify, youtube, and all the podcast apps. Our cast rotates. Skip around and listen to snippets from a few episodes to see which of our members you want to play with first. The episodes aren't all great, but we have fun together. This isn't a job. It's a hobby, a way to relax and laugh meeting new people who slowly over time become lifelong friends. It's okay to miss games; you aren’t expected to be present for every session. The opt-in format naturally minimizes table trouble because you can see who’s signed up to GM and play in a game before you join it, and can pick dates that have people you’re looking forward to playing with.

# Joining:

To join, email us at FirebreathingKittensPodcast at gmail dot com and tell us about your equipment. Our minimum requirement is 24 bit audio (not 16 bit). If you don’t know what 24 bit audio means that’s not a problem, the new members tab of FirebreathingKittensPodcast dot com has an equipment section that explains what all the microphone words mean with pictures and videos. We welcome members of all experience levels and will train you. The new members tab also has info about our format and answers to frequently asked questions. Minimum age 21 years old. We reply to all emails from people who have 24 bit audio within three days with a support agreement for you to sign, and then will guide you through character creation and train you how to record great audio.

American actors in Montreal? 

We are looking for american speaking male talents…
items.summary:
American actors in Montreal? 

We are looking for american speaking male talents to audition for a Non Union voice and motion capture project ''Washington Irving's Hologram''. 
Voice should sound 40-55 years old but it's ok if you look younger. No beards
This casting welcomes submissions from all backgrounds
 
Project: Village of Sleepy Hollow near New York
Rate is 1500$ Non Union
Recording date: Week of July 4th
Production type: Mocap, hologram for a circus
Recording duration: 1 full day with Mocap
Deadline for submissions : Monday June 27th @ 12 pm

Role description:
Looking for a very good actor who can voice a learned six minute monologue for a holographic depiction of Washington Irving, writer of “The Legend of Sleepy Hollow”. This role requires a  sounding American Accent. The actor cannot be claustrophobic. He will have to wear a motion capture suit + facial capture helmet.

Submissions:
Please forward self-tapes visual auditions to sondageperspectives@gmail.com with the following assets:
- A video recording of yourself acting the suggested highlighted lines
- A resume and picture if one is available

Note: Only your voice will be showcased for 4 weeks during the Winchester Art Circus presentation with the other characters at 5 presentations per week.
See below the link  and script :
 
script : 
“I sealed this letter 200 years ago with the promise to return to tell the REAL story of what I meant by “The Legend”. And that time has now come...
Well now…this is quite the cozy gathering. Welcome. I am Washington Irving.
This is an old story I have to tell, a two-hundred year old story of ghosts and goblins, guile and gullibility, of contests and conquests.
You’ll see some rivalry, a dose of unrequited infatuation, a handful of greed and bullying. But at the bottom of it all, when you get down to the last draw of your ale, it’s just the plain nature of the human condition that tells its own story...in a most peculiar way.
It’s said that legends are the tall tales told to make sense of the things too great, or too terrifying to believe.
The thing about legends is: sometimes they’re true.
Welcome to our legend…The Legend of Sleepy Hollow…”

Link :
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington_Irving](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington_Irving)

items.title:
Dear People! 
Please make sure you always check if the offer is legit before sen…
items.summary:
Dear People! 
Please make sure you always check if the offer is legit before sending any personal data to anyone!
Scammers are everywhere.

Especially with big events and well-known brands, you should always get an official e-mail address and name of the agency handling the casting that you can then double check to make sure they are legit and handling this particular casting. 

No big events cast Performers via private messages on Facebook. 

I just warned people under one post here and was blocked by the person who wrote it, which proves to me it was a scam.

i know that finding jobs is tough right now, but don’t let evil people take advantage of you 💜💜💜 don’t rush, double check, keep your data private.

Lots of love!

Full details and application link here: [[https://www.backstage.com/.../jupiters-ghost-genesis.../...](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.backstage.com%2Fcasting%2Fjupiters-ghost-genesis-3003749%2F%3Futm_source%3Dsocial_share%26utm_medium%3Dcopy_link%26utm_campaign%3Dcasting_call.%26fbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBEwSTlvMkxRRFBZVjlLRDJKTwEekRbzp7zHz1k83Hl_GIDRk7F8SDdwmmH1aXDQ2OYCFO5Kd-UcVEJYOtKKbqU_aem_gjGfi1kPTvCNQtOKhLPfCw&h=AT2esFwPb7oRLSKwmXRr_RjVDwJV2kBFT8BsP6t-ZXWDrSSJsNzoRQt-zshifH7DwyZMd3eBY9ky8FHkwtP0nBkSymgShPl2BMW0E2YN-kDmNw3BIgGSJquAl9H5ZJCXytV_&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT2A5YybxN_CynnBYwoUSVcV-A-ywg78ixRI6rJnL7CxHu_n_FU3j6JdNC-A4pKkQxl-eQKJGIwykfWE6-4GBCF77LrbgR71rFifsbS6Md998INlsddvYt9pyPZ9pSeShyfKe85swNR_y4Kt1CPETLhLkiExfye7Xjnh8iR_XXw8)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.backstage.com%2Fcasting%2Fjupiters-ghost-genesis-3003749%2F%3Futm_source%3Dsocial_share%26utm_medium%3Dcopy_link%26utm_campaign%3Dcasting_call.%26fbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBEwSTlvMkxRRFBZVjlLRDJKTwEeIHCDBhNyRUr-DeUHVG7eHx7P7qptnY_60ULYm0xmoMhlgPgdUjedtpN-ehg_aem_IRePbTVsc6Rlh88mLWDURA&h=AT2esFwPb7oRLSKwmXRr_RjVDwJV2kBFT8BsP6t-ZXWDrSSJsNzoRQt-zshifH7DwyZMd3eBY9ky8FHkwtP0nBkSymgShPl2BMW0E2YN-kDmNw3BIgGSJquAl9H5ZJCXytV_&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT2A5YybxN_CynnBYwoUSVcV-A-ywg78ixRI6rJnL7CxHu_n_FU3j6JdNC-A4pKkQxl-eQKJGIwykfWE6-4GBCF77LrbgR71rFifsbS6Md998INlsddvYt9pyPZ9pSeShyfKe85swNR_y4Kt1CPETLhLkiExfye7Xjnh8iR_XXw8)

Vi søger en familie i forbindelse med optagelse af reklame film for et forsikringsselskab. 

Vi søger en famile med to forældre, 2-3 børn (4-12 år), evt et kæledyr, og bor i København eller en nærliggene kommune.
Vi vil komme hjem til jer og filme med jer i jeres vante rammer.

Optagelserne ligger i uge 39, og vi vil gerne være flexible på hvilken uge dag der passer jer bedst.

Har det interesse, så skriv til os på [cast@plotworks.dk](mailto:cast@plotworks.dk)

Husk at sende **billeder / video** med.

God ide også at inkludere mobilnummer, så vi nemt kan få fat på jer.
Kommentar og privatbeskeder besvares ikke

Hey allesammen

Vi er 5 studerende på NEXT Kbh og er igan…
items.summary:
❗️AKUT CASTING CALL❗️

Hey allesammen

Vi er 5 studerende på NEXT Kbh og er igang med at lave en drama dokumentar

Dertil søger vi akut nogle statister som bor i Københavnsområdet, til at være med i vores skoleprojekt “Ham med tasken”

Vi skal bruge:

2 mænd i alderen 18-30

Beskrivelse af rolle:
De er iklædt elefanthuer og skal simulere et hjemmerøveri (meget få replikker)
Optagelserne foregår imorgen aften torsdag d.4/9 - kl: 20

En kvinde til at spille mor i alderen 30-50

Beskrivelse af rolle:
Hovedpersonens mor, medvirker i en enkelt scene (ingen replikker)
Optagelserne foregår mandag d. 8/9 - kl: 10.00

Da det er et skoleprojekt, kan vi desværre ikke tilbyde hverken betaling eller til-gode bevis, men vi sørger for forfriskninger på settet!

Håber på at finde nogen der er friske på hurtigt at træde til🙏🏼

Hav en fortsat dejlig aften😊

items.title:
Kære alle,

"VULVA VULVA VAP VAP" - en kortfilm støttet af Københavns Filmværkst…
items.summary:
Kære alle,

"VULVA VULVA VAP VAP" - en kortfilm støttet af Københavns Filmværksted - søger statister.

Alle i alderen ****18-70 år**** er mere end velkomne til at deltage. Statisterne skal medvirke som gæster på en jazzbar. Optagelserne vil foregå tirsdag ****d. 3. september mellem 14-16.**
**
Optagelserne finder sted på ****Frederiksberg, København.****

Da det er et passionsprojekt for alle på set, kan vi desværre ikke tilbyde løn eller frokost. Til gengæld sørger vi for snacks og god stemning.

"VULVA VULVA VAP VAP" handler om en kvindes kamp med impostor-syndrom, hendes søgen efter autencitet, og den personlige udvikling, der opstår når hun konfronterer sine usikkerheder. Kortfilmen er skrevet og instrueret af Monica Thorup.

Hvis det lyder som noget for dig og dine venner/veninder/kæreste eller nabo må du meget gerne sende en mail til karenroemoe@gmail.com med følgende oplysninger:
* Fulde navn
* Telefonnummer

Bedste hilsner,

Karen //

Produktionskoordinator på "VULVA VULVA VAP VAP"

items.title: Magister Aleksandra Winiarska ist eine erfahrene Musikpädagogin mit 20 Jahren Er…
items.summary:
Magister Aleksandra Winiarska ist eine erfahrene Musikpädagogin mit 20 Jahren Erfahrung im Unterrichten von Gesang, Gitarre und Klavier.

*Ausbildung und Erfahrung*
- *Ausbildung*: Magister der Vocalpädagogik mit reicher pädagogischer Erfahrung.
- *Erfahrung*: 20 Jahre Arbeit mit Schülern verschiedenen Alters und unterschiedlichem musikalischem Niveau.
- Spezialisiert auf Gesangsunterricht, akustische/klassische Gitarre und Klavier.

*Merkmale der pädagogischen Arbeit*
- *Individueller Ansatz*: Unterricht wird an die Ziele, Bedürfnisse und den Lernstil jedes Schülers angepasst.
- *Professioneller Ansatz*: Erfahrene Pädagogin mit Leidenschaft für Musikunterricht.
- Schafft eine freundliche, inspirierende Unterrichtsatmosphäre und unterstützt die musikalische Entwicklung der Schüler.

*Unterrichtsangebot*
- *Gesang*: Vokaltechnik, Interpretation, klassisches und modernes Repertoire.
- *Gitarre*: Unterricht in akustischer/klassischer Gitarre, Spieltechniken, Repertoire.
- *Klavier*: Klaviertechnik, klassisches und Unterhaltungsrepertoire.
- Unterricht findet im 23. Bezirk in Wien statt.

*Preise*
- 40€ für 60 Minuten (oder 35€ für 50 Minuten) - zugänglicher Preis für professionellen Musikunterricht.
- *Erstes Treffen gratis*.

*Zielgruppe*
- Anfänger und fortgeschrittene Musiker.
- Kinder, Jugendliche und Erwachsene.
- Personen, die ein musikalisches Hobby suchen oder ihre musikalischen Leidenschaften entwickeln möchten.

*Kontakt*
- Telefon: 0043 660 284 1503
- Email: musica.spirit@gmx.at

Magister Aleksandra Winiarska lädt ein, das musikalische Abenteuer mit professionellem Unterricht in Wien zu beginnen.

items.title:
🎬 **CASTING CALL – “Horizons” (Short Film – Edinburgh)** 🎬

**TITLE:** *Horizo…
items.summary:
🎬 **CASTING CALL – “Horizons” (Short Film – Edinburgh)** 🎬

**TITLE:** *Horizons*
**PRODUCTION TYPE:** Short Film (10 Minutes)
**LOCATION:** Edinburgh, Scotland
**PRODUCTION DATE:** Shooting July 2nd–7th, 2025
**PAID, UNPAID OR PROFIT SHARE:** Paid (Student Project – Currently Crowdfunding)
**PRODUCER OR PRODUCTION COMPANY:** Edinburgh Napier Masters Project – Screen Academy Scotland
**HOW TO APPLY:** Visit [https://actorsandextras.com/casting-calls](https://actorsandextras.com/casting-calls) for casting details

**ROLE BREAKDOWN:**
*Horizons* follows Fiona, who returns home for her mother’s birthday and is confronted by the emotional weight of absent family and her mother's unsettling indifference. This heartfelt drama explores the clash between tradition and change across generations.

🎭 **Roles Casting:**

**FIONA**
* Female, 40s
* Emotionally conflicted, driven to hold her family together
* Haunted by a sense of loss and disconnection, clinging to tradition
* Strong dramatic range required

**MOIRA**
* Female, 70s
* Outgoing and social, recently widowed
* Trying to enjoy life despite changes and questions about her mental wellbeing
* Warm, resilient character, sometimes frustrated by Fiona’s concern

🎥 **Auditions:**
* In-person: Sunday 15th & Monday 16th June (Edinburgh)
* Self-tapes welcome

📣 **Additional Info:**
The production is part of a final Masters project. Crowdfunding is underway to support the cast, with further details available on the [Horizons Crowdfunder page](https://www.crowdfunder.co.uk/p/horizons-shortfilm).

items.title: Casting Call! Warrington/Manchester area, late October/early November filming da…
items.summary:
Casting Call! Warrington/Manchester area, late October/early November filming dates.

We are looking for one Female and one Male actor to play the lead roles in our upcoming short film, ‘Oh, Death’, a comedy drama exploring themes of choice, family, death and morality. Synopsis below;

After his abrupt and unexpected death, Peter is almost elated to be greeted by an Agent of Death and to discover that there is an afterlife. Peter believes he’s done enough good to earn his ticket Up, but when sarcastic and bored Margo tells him he’s going Down, Peter has only a short time to convince her to change her mind to avoid an eternity of punishment.

The Roles-

Peter- 
Male
Age- 35-45

Personality- Selfish, uncaring, wants to be good but rarely musters up the effort to do so

Requirements for the role- Willing to learn a few Gaelic phrases

Margo- 
Female
Age- 30-40

Personality- Sarcastic, funny, rude, nonchalant yet an imposing figure

Requirements for the role- Willing to learn a few Gaelic phrases

Due to the limited budget of our film, roles are unpaid but we will cover the cost of travel and provide/pay for food and drink. Filming will take place in Warrington/Manchester area, filming dates are;

Saturday 25th October
Friday 7th November
Saturday 8th November

If you’re interested, we’d love to hear from you! 

Send an email to deadhorsestudios2025@gmail.com stating which character you’d like to play and a link to your showreel if you have one! Shortlisted actors will be given more character information and will be asked to record a self tape of one of the scenes before we make our final decision.

You can visit our YouTube or Instagram page, Dead Horse Studios, to check out a little of what we’re about, including our latest short film, ‘The Block’ that was entered into the Cannes Film Festival earlier this year.

We can’t wait to hear from you,
Andrew and the rest of the Dead Horse Studios crew.

items.title:
GESUCHT:

Männlicher Schauspieler im Alter von ca. 24 bis 35 Jahren für Musikvid…
items.summary:
GESUCHT:

Männlicher Schauspieler im Alter von ca. 24 bis 35 Jahren für Musikvideodreh in HAMBURG.

Ich bin Cleo, Sängerin und Songwriterin aus Hamburg. Aktuell arbeite ich mit meiner indie-pop Band FiNDiNG CLEO an der Umsetzung des Musikvideos zu unserem neuen Song *"Can't Stand the Silence". *

Für den professionellen Dreh des Musikvideos suchen wir kurzfristig einen männlichen Schauspieler im Alter von ca. 24 bis 35 Jahren. Es handelt sich um einige ergänzende Szenen, die als Flashbacks eine emotionale und intime Verbindung zwischen den beiden Hauptfiguren darstellen sollen.

Der Dreh findet **innerhalb der nächsten 2 oder 3 Wochen** in Hamburg statt und wird von einem erfahrenen, professionellen Team umgesetzt. Die Teilnahme wird selbstverständlich vergütet, Details hierzu können gerne im weiteren Gespräch geklärt werden. Es handelt sich um einen Drehtag im zeitlichen Umfang von ca. 2-3h. Der Termin erfolgt in Absprache mit dem Schauspieler und Videographen. 

Bei Interesse gerne melden!

items.title: Casting "The Quiet Soul," an independent short film exploring themes of isolatio…
items.summary:
Casting "The Quiet Soul," an independent short film exploring themes of isolation, resilience, and the quiet strength of human connection. The story follows Nathan, a young athlete whose life is suddenly upended when he suffers a stroke, leaving him with locked-in syndrome. Trapped within his own body, Nathan faces the challenge of reconnecting with the world around him, rediscovering his independence, and navigating the emotional distance that has grown between him and those he loves.

"The Quiet Soul" is a story of enduring connection, showing how love and perseverance can bridge the deepest barriers, even when words are no longer possible.

Submissions

with the following assets:Please forward your applications and auditions to [https://docs.google.com/.../1FAIpQLSexwYdewcS.../viewform...](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSexwYdewcScTMfl0wcXOSLiTFeC-7WdaXT-eC6G8v6VDP9D4Q/viewform?usp=sf_link&fbclid=IwAR07f02q-gBK0Lytri2uPlOxVsZvmhU-M7Z7Sjs4tmSRRBf_kmQ0gakqQRg)

A portrait or headshot

Your name

Your age

Your tel & email

A video recording of yourself acting out the sample script (more details below)

Or email it to sondageperspectives@gmail.com

Video Audition

Please choose one of the following scripts below based on the age range and character-type you’d like to audition for, and record yourself reading that character’s lines.

Script 1 (Male auditions): see page 2

Script 2 (Female auditions): see page 3

Submission Deadline: Wednesday June 8th, 11 AM

SCRIPT 1: Male Audition Script Read

Adam: *Sees Matt coming out of a room* Hey! What did you think about the exam?

Matt: You guys want to know a secret?

Adam: *Confused Look* Secret? Sure?

Matt: Okay but promise me you won’t tell ANYBODY!

Adam: *exhales* I promise.

Matt: *Whispers slowly* I cheated.

Adam: You what?!? That is not okay!

Matt: Shhh it’s okay, everyone cheats, what’s the big deal?

Adam: It’s not fair for people like me who put in the work to study for these exams! Plus, the professor asked us to report any incidence of cheating and its university policy.

Matt: Can you calm down! I might fail the course if the professor finds out that I cheated. Plus, any cheating violation will be on my transcript so future employers might not hire me. I have so much to lose.

Adam: Yeah but...*Gets interrupted by Matt*

Matt: Look, you promised me that you won’t tell anybody. So, I’m trusting you. Anyways I'm getting late for my next class, I’ll talk to you later. *Walks out of frame*

Adam: *Stares into camera with a stressed attitude* This is not okay...We need to do something about this.

SCRIPT 2: Female Audition Script Read

Emily: *Looks at Claire and camera* I can’t wait to get off work.

Claire: Me too! Do you guys have any plans for the weekend?

Emily: I’m actually going on a date tomorrow!

Claire: What! Who’s the lucky man?

Emily: *Hesitates* Uhh...Uhh...*Looks at Claire and camera* promise me you both won’t tell anyone.

Claire: *Confused Look while looking at camera* Okay?... We promise.

Emily: *Gasp* It’s Dave.

Claire: Dave?!?, our manager?

Emily: Shhh calm down it’s not a big deal.

Claire: It’s against company policy for co-workers to date. This could end up being really bad for both of you. Just last month, 2 employees got fired for dating each another.

Emily: Well, Dave is the manager, so no one is going to know, and you better stay quiet about it. Remember, you promised me that you won’t tell anyone!

Claire: *Stares into camera and gasps*

UNPAID CASTING CALL 

DATES: 01/02/26-01/09/26
WHERE: Yellv…
items.summary:
CASTING CALL NOTICE

UNPAID CASTING CALL 

DATES: 01/02/26-01/09/26
WHERE: Yellville, Arkansas & St. Louis, Missouri
COMPENSATION: Housing, Food, Credit, Copy for Reel (Traveling costs can be discussed)

THIS FILM DEALS WITH SEXUAL ASSAULT, VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN, UNDERAGE SMOKING AND DRINKING, AND SEXUAL SCENARIOS AND THEMES. IF THIS IS TRIGGERING FOR YOU, PLEASE DO NOT AUDITION. We need actors who are able to portray these characters without harming their mental wellbeing.

Tell Them is a psychological thriller directed by Gray Love Campbell and produced by Magdalene Harper and Griffin Smith. Eight friends - Luke, Jack, Theo, Emmett, Lottie, Noah, Melody, and Stevie - are excited for a weekend getaway to a remote cabin that’s guaranteed to be filled with drinking, smoking, dumb games, and some messy hook ups. When a game of spin the bottle goes awry, a dark secret about Jack and Stevie is revealed. The night is ruined and all hell breaks loose. Stevie tries to disappear and gain her composure. In her emotional state, she clings to the only person there for her: Theo. It’s heated. It’s desperate. It’s- quickly ended. After a mean joke, Theo snaps and kills Stevie.  When the group downstairs hears the commotion and come across the body, the only thing they can do is to cover up what’s been done… by blaming someone else.

CHARACTERS NEEDED:
Theo (21) - Male. White. Lean or average build but is deceptively strong. 

Noah (20) - Female. White. Blonde with a commanding presence.

Jack (21) - Male. White. Tall, muscular, and handsome.

Lottie (20) - Female. White. Brunette.

Luke (20) - Male. White. Queer. Lanky and lean frame with a feminine and/or androgynous edge.

Emmett (21) - Male. Asian. Average-appearing young man.

Melody (18) - Female. Black. Petite with delicate features.

Stevie (20) - Female. Hispanic. Curvy.

Detective Scott (50s’) - Male. White.

Detective Garcia (30s’) - Female. Hispanic.

PLEASE AUDITION THROUGH THE GOOGLE FORM ATTACHED TO THIS POST BY OCTOBER 15TH.

Thank you!

items.title: Zelda and David, a recently separated couple, are locked in a bitter custody bat…
items.summary:
Zelda and David, a recently separated couple, are locked in a bitter custody battle over their daughter, Ava. When they reunite with their new partners under one roof, tensions escalate into a dark, twisted game—each couple secretly plotting to poison the other in a desperate bid for sole custody. 

Inspired by Impressionism, this film uses light as a metaphor for time to explore the shifting nature of human relationships. As spaces and objects remain unchanged, emotions disintegrate—what once nurtured love now houses its unraveling.

Korean director Won Jang, whose award-winning short film The Stench garnered critical acclaim, is deeply committed to directing this project. As both the writer and the original source of inspiration, he brings a unique personal vision to the story. He believes his intimate connection to the material makes him best suited to authentically convey the characters' emotions in his feature debut.

Key Information

Shooting Dates - 5th-15th October 2025

Shooting Location - We will be filming in a house near Camelford, Cornwall. You will need to be able to drive to location as public transport doesn’t reach it. Alternatively if you’re London based or in the South of England, we can provide accommodation on set.

Rates

The main characters:  £100 a day 

Fuel costs will be covered if Cornwall based and the set is catered

How To Apply

Please send your headshot and showreel to the following email: assassinationfilm@gmail.com

Application Deadline: Saturday 13th September

The Roles

Zelda

Required for the full 10 days

Playing Age: early 30s to early 40s�

Gender: Female�

Accent: Neutral or regional as required

Zelda is an emotionally vulnerable yet guarded woman, shaped by the pain of a traumatic miscarriage and the breakdown of her marriage. She presents a sharp wit and a defiant streak, often appearing irritable and defensive. Beneath that, however, is a deep well of longing and emotional complexity. Though she's with a new partner, she remains unsettled—yearning for connection and hoping to find it in the possibility of a new, stable family.

Additional Notes:

A background in dance or movement is a plus. Actor must be comfortable portraying psychological nuance, emotional stillness, and layered internal shifts.

Thomas

Required for 6 of the 10 shooting dates (TBD)

Playing Age: 30's

Gender: Male

Accent: Neutral or regional as required

Thomas is a shamelessly self-serving man—charming on the surface, but manipulative and cunning underneath. He uses his natural charisma to influence others and mask his true motives, though not as skillfully as he believes. His overconfidence often reveals the cracks in his carefully constructed facade, making his deceit more obvious than he intends.

items.title:
** Casting Call – Kort drama-dokumentar om Maren Spliids **

Vi er en gruppe fil…
items.summary:
** Casting Call – Kort drama-dokumentar om Maren Spliids **

Vi er en gruppe filmstuderende, der arbejder på en drama-dokumentar om hekseprocessen mod Maren Spliids i 1641 – en af de mest kendte hekseafbrændinger i Danmark.

Vi søger stadig skuespillere og statister til følgende roller:

⸻

**• Didrik Skrædder (birolle, mand, ca. 30–45 år)**

En skrædder fra Flensborg og Marens hovedanklager. Han er en mand med nag, som føler sig krænket og hævder, at Maren har forbandet ham. Hans vrede og stædighed driver sagen fremad – en karakter, der balancerer mellem at virke tragisk og skræmmende.

**• Mandlige statister i alderen 30-50 år**

Til roller som rådgivere og vagter for Christian IV. Her bliver du en del af kongens følge og med til at skabe den historiske atmosfære i filmen.

⸻

**Optagelser:** Forventes at starte den 4. september og varer frem til den 15. september i Storkøbenhavn/Nordsjælland (nærmere info følger).

Projektet er et uddannelsesprojekt, så vi kan desværre ikke tilbyde løn, men vi sørger for forplejning på set.

 For interesse, kontakt instruktør **Nikolaj Willerslev Rosenmejer** på tlf. **22823282** eller mail **nikolaj1099@gmail.com**

items.title:
Statist/deltager i kortfilm/reklame søges.

Hej alle,

Til et projekt skal vi la…
items.summary:
Statist/deltager i kortfilm/reklame søges.

Hej alle,

Til et projekt skal vi lave en kortfilm der "rækker tunge af corona".

Vi søger derfor nogle friske mennesker der vil deltage.

Vi søger to primær roller, en kvinde og en mand, begge voksne, dvs fra Ca 20 og opefter. Begge skal være åbne og udadvendt og være velsoignerede. 
I filmen skal kvinden give manden et langt slik op af kinden, så dette skal man være klar på.
Bygning og udseende er der ikke som sådan krav til, bare man passer ind 😀

Vi skal også bruge en række statister, både børn voksne og ældre. Igen er der ikke de store krav, bare man er frisk, åben og ikke bange for at være lidt fjollet.

Er stort plus for alle roller, er hvis man kan stikke tungen langt ud 😀

Optagelser foregår i Aalborg, kbh og århus og skydes efter den 6. Maj.

Et krav for deltagerne er løbende corona tests inden optagelser starter, og dagligt hvis de trækker ud.

Send en besked hvis i har interesse, det forventes at der medsendes billede, samt en kort beskrivelse hvorfor man vil passe godt ind.

Løn aftales individuelt ved interesse. 

Mvh kasper

Der vil være forplejning på set, og som tak for hjælpen får man 2 stk. biografbilletter.

Vi har selvfølgelig også styr på Corona restriktionerne, så for at deltage skal man møde op med en negativ Corona test (Både PCR og kviktest er godkendt) som er maks 72 timer gammel når optagelserne slutter!

items.title:
CASTING CALL 
St. James's Place x Sky Arts Idents
Fees: £300 BSF, £1000 usage

A…
items.summary:
CASTING CALL 
St. James's Place x Sky Arts Idents
Fees: £300 BSF, £1000 usage

Are you an artist with a mentor or supporter you want to celebrate?

Raw Research Casting is looking for artists and makers from any artistic discipline (including visual arts, theatre, music, dance, design, crafts, and more) who would like to celebrate a mentor or supporter who made a real difference in their creative journey.

Whether it’s a teacher, friend, partner, parent, grandparent, sibling, or colleague - if someone gave you a pivotal piece of advice or support that helped shape your creative path, we want to hear from you.

Each short film (ident) will feature interviews with both the artist and their mentor / supporter, along with footage of the artist’s creative work or process. Crucially, will need the artists to supply photos or video clips that show their career development too.

Filming will take place in London for one day during the week of 21st July 2025.

Both the artist and their mentor/supporter will be paid for their time.

To apply or find out more, email casting@rawresearch.co.uk with the subject line “ARTIST CASTING”.
